answers.answer: Your question in order to be answered requires members to search for army_wifey23, who posted back in 2010 !Not the best way for many members to respond.However, you're a new member and I'll do you the courtesy of re-posting her question :"I can't figure out what is cause my symptoms.I have no energy at all, no matter how much sleep I have. I start to get light headed then the hot flashes come on, then I get dizzy and feel like i'm about to pass out. Most of the time I get nauseated as well. I work at an assisted living home/nursing home so things fly around there all of the time. It's just starting to happen more often. I've kept check of my sugar my levels stay at normal levels. I just can't figure out what is causing it."N41N41Are you female?( Hot flashes )Do you consume wheat, gluten, grains, dairy, baked goods, sweets, sodas, pizza, cereals, pasta?If yes, have you ever tried an elimination diet?Have you had blood tests  for anemia, iron deficiency,B12 deficiency, vitamin D deficiency, diabetes?Are you overweight?Have you done any thyroid testing?What is your age, activity levels, prior diagnoses, medications and any other details you think might be helpful.Please be generous with the information you post.Cheers,Niko

question: My symptoms are very similar to army_wifey23 But I do not work at nursing homes, I just get these symptoms  every once and a while.Am I seriously sick?
title: do I have an undiagnosed illness?
